text: Jorge Andrés Segura Portocarrero (18 January 1997) is a footballer from Colombia who plays as a center back for Atlas. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Colombia under-20 international footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Envigado F.C. players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:Real Valladolid Promesas players Category:Atlas F.C. footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:People from Valle del Cauca Department
title: Jorge Segura (footballer)
